text: Ernst-Joachim Küppers (24 August 1942 – 5 February 2025) was a German swimmer. He competed in two events at the 1964 Summer Olympics. He won the silver medal in 1964. He was born in Halle, Gau Halle-Merseburg, Germany. Ernst-Joachim Küppers died on 5 February 2025 in Herne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2025 deaths Category:German swimmers Category:Olympic silver medalists for Germany Category:Sportspeople from Saxony-Anhalt
title: Ernst-Joachim Küppers
